ValidationRule.description: Check if trying to payout more than what is available
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( Drawdown_Created__c, False, IF( Opportunity__r.Amount_Available_for_Scheduled_Payments__c - Amount__c + IF(ISNEW(), 0, PRIORVALUE(Amount__c)) + ( Opportunity_Service_Provider__r.Allowance_Available__c ) >= 0 , False , True ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not enough funds available for that amount
